phrases: cukorfalat mameshiba
-OP-
-ED-
-TS-
This place was our home for 15 years.
Kids!
Dinnertime!
Sure, Daddy!
Today we are having curry!
About how the geezer died...
About me...
Yukio has not asked anything.
What could he be thinking?
It is time to leave, is not it?
I already feel so lonely!
Feel free to drop by anytime!
This is your home!
Sure.
By the way, where is Yukio?
Did he go back to the dorm already?
No, but I have not seen him today.
I am scared!
Yukio.
Yukio, come with Daddy...
That one-man clown act is late.
And Yukio's not here, either.
That was close!
Where do you think you are driving?!
Oh my, what a sunny day!
A beautiful clear sky to accompany you on your new journey!
What is with that car?
Where the hell are you planning to take me to?
To True Cross Academy, of course.
True Cross Academy?
Exactly.
You know, to the general public I am the Principal of the Academy.
And thus from today you will be a student of my Academy as well.
Sorry for the wait!
I am glad I do not have to be separated from my dear brother!
Yukio?
Thank you for going through all this trouble, Mr Faust.
Faust?
Were not you Mephisto?
Johann Faust V.
It is the name I use in public.
Now let us head to my True Cross Academy!
What is going on?
I asked him to make me an Exorcist...
The hell...
What is wrong?
Nothing...
By the way, where were you this morning?
I visited Father's grave.
Did you go too?
No...
Too late to do anything about that.
We will soon arrive at the center of True Cross Academy Town.
Amazing!
This is the Academy Town with all of our educational institutions.
Please study to your heart's content!
Okumura, change to your uniform.
Would it have hurt to tell me earlier?
You are good at tying your necktie.
I cannot trust him.
Yukio's being himself and asking nothing.
Hey Yukio.
Were you surprised that a dropout like me got into your True Cross Academy too?
Huh?
Sorry, I am a bit nervous...
Freshmen representative, Yukio Okumura.
Yes.
Yukio's...!
The freshmen representative got the highest grade on the entrance exam, right?
Amazing!
Yuuka, is not he cool?
Passing through the gates of the Academy I so admired,
I feel nervous just as much as grateful.
That crybaby who always got bullied...
All the more, I hope we will be able to further our skills through friendly competition.
I am the freshmen representative, Yukio Okumura.
Freshmen!
I will be leading you around the Academy, so please follow me.
Okumura, what faculty are you in?
The Special Advancement faculty...
Wow!
And you are so tall, too!
Huh, you want to become a doctor?
Well, um, that is...
Amazing!
That is so cool!
You will be the best doc ever!
Well... I do not know...
I am sure of it!
Thanks!
That is right, he is going to become a doctor.
Yukio does not know anything.
I cannot involve him in this.
This is my problem.
What the...?
Is this really a school?
There is even a chandelier...
Like in a five star restaurant!
Wow, it is huge!
This classroom is just too big!
This desk is even larger than the one in the monastery!
What is wrong with that guy?
What is he doing here?
Well, this would be it for today.
Everyone return to your rooms and be sure to attend classes starting next week.
I just wanted to work after middle school.
I could not care less about high school.
I am doing this just to become an Exorcist!
Oi, where is the dorm?
No one told me that!
A dog?
Oi, hey!
What the?
Pardon me.
But the Principal cannot just meaninglessly wander around the campus.
I did not know Exorcists could transform!
They cannot.
I am special.
With this key you can conveniently go to your cram school classes from any door.
Cram school?
Cram school for Exorcists.
While you will be attending high school classes just like everyone else,
the Exorcist training will take place in the cram school.
As a Page, you will study Exorcism.
While the high school classes begin next week, your cram school starts today.
You are prepared, right?
Of course!
But let me warn you.
It is a secret that you are Satan's offspring.
Even if we can cover up your teeth, ears and tail,
there is no explanation for your flames.
Please control yourself.
Yeah, I will do my best.
Great.
Then, shall we get going?
Wait...
Now try opening this door with your key.
Sure.
Ouch!
Amazing!
The first-year classes are held in classroom 1106.
Let us go.
Sure.
This way.
Just for today I will stick around, too.
Damn, this is making me nervous.
Ein... Zwei... Drei...
Let us go.
You can still talk?!
Did not you want to become an Exorcist?
Is not that the reason why you are here?
It is so dirty...
I am Rin Okumura.
Nice to meet you.
Who the hell are these guys?
They are going through Exorcist training just like you.
Some of them are yet to receive a Spirit Wound,
and some already have it.
Spirit Wound?
Wounds or illness inflicted by a demon.
You become able to see demons when you get a Spirit Wound.
It is necessary to go through it to become an Exorcist.
Well, you do not need it since you are a demon yourself.
Your teacher has arrived.
Good afternoon.
I am your teacher, Yukio Okumura.
Huh?!
Yukio?!
Nice to meet you.
I am Yukio Okumura and I am a new teacher here.
I will be teaching you Anti-Demon Pharmacology starting today.
Nice to meet you!
Hello!
Huh?!
Yukio?!
What is wrong?
Do not you what is wrong me!
What is wrong with you?!
Although I am the same age as all of you,
I have been studying Exorcism from the age of seven.
I finished my studies two years ago.
So please address me accordingly while in class.
From the age of seven?
You are kidding me...
He is a genius in Anti-Demon Pharmacology, the youngest person ever to get the Exorcist certificate.
Is there anyone among you who has yet to received a Spirit Wound?
Three...
Then let us start the first class with the ceremony of the Spirit Wound.
Ceremony of the Spirit Wound?
He will summon a demon and make it give a Spirit Wound to those who do not have it yet.
Actually this classroom is usually vacant so it has become the nest of goblins.
Are we going to be all right?
Do not worry.
They are low class demons without any power in particular.
What is going on here, Yukio?
You...
Hey Yukio!
You are in class.
Sit down.
Could it be that he knew... about Father... and about me?
As I said earlier, goblins are low-class demons -
demons are still demons.
Hey Yukio, explain it!
If they smell rotten animal blood they get excited and go wild.
Wait a sec, Yukio!
Explain this to me!
Yukio!
What do you mean?
Are you screwing with me?
Guess this cannot be avoided.
I am sorry but please wait outside the classroom while I have a little chat with Mr Okumura.
Annoying brat!
What is going on?
So?
What did you want to ask about?
Do not play dumb with me!
What is going on here?!
You never told me about this!
I guess you should just explain.
As I said earlier, I became an Exorcist two years ago.
I was training from the age of seven,
under the guidance of Father, of course.
The geezer?!
Then you knew everything about his work?
Yeah.
You were the only one who did not know.
Since I received a Spirit Wound from my demon brother when we were born...
I have been able to see demons for as long as I can remember.
That is... but why?
Why did not you tell me anything until today?
I asked you why?!
Let go of me.
Yukio!
That stinks!
Yukio?
Hobgoblins.
There are many of them so they go even wilder.
I will get rid of them, so you...
We are not done talking yet!
Anyway, what did you think about me until now?
What did I think about you?
It is obvious.
You are a demon, and as such you pose a great danger.
That has not changed.
You are such an idiot.
Why did you say you wanted to become an Exorcist?
Revenge?
Or...
Or is this how you want to repent for what you did to Father?
If that is how you really think...
You should quietly hand yourself over to the Order,
or just die.
Are you saying it is my fault that he died?
Is not it so?
He was protecting you all this time.
And I was watching the whole time.
Since Father's body was the only one able to host Satan, he was constantly targeted!
He kept Satan at bay with pure willpower!
He was the strongest Exorcist!
As long as his willpower did not falter...
There is no way Satan could have possessed him!
You said something to him, did not you?!
Never call yourself my father again!
If Father had any weakness it would have been you, Rin.
You killed Father!
You are right to call me an idiot, so I do not care what you tell me.
However...
Do not you go pointing a gun at your brother!
We are brothers, are not we?!
I did not kill our Father!
If shooting me would make you feel better,
go on and shoot!
Shoot!
Do not think so lowly of me.
I will not fight my brother.
What were Father's last moments like?
He was so cool.
He died protecting me to the very end.
I did not decide to become an Exorcist out of revenge or some complicated reason like that.
I just want to become stronger!
I do not want anyone to die because of me anymore!
I am scared...
I do not want to see those scary things anymore!
Yukio.
Yukio, come with Daddy and fight.
Do not you want to become stronger than those things lurking in the dark
so you can protect your brother and the others?
Protect... my brother?
Yeah.
It is the same.
Huh?
I became an Exorcist because of what Father told me...
I wanted to get stronger.
It is the same as you.
If you really want to become an Exorcist,
this will not be the last time you hear what I just told you.
Just die.
Every Exorcist is after your life.
You should be prepared.
Yes, sir.
Sorry for making you wait.
Let us continue with the class.
What happened?
What is this?
What the hell did they do?
Huh?
Why are you here?
Are you surprised?
I insisted and they put us in the same room.
Also, we are the only ones in this dorm.
You are dangerous so I have to keep an eye on you.
Keep an eye on me?!
Is this a prison or what?!
Yes and I am the warden.
You want to become an Exorcist, right?
Then you should be able to bear with this.
You little...
Excellent!
Keep up that spirit!
Now, let us do today's homework.
Homework?
Were not you listening?
Sure I will do it!
I should do it, right?
I should think of a class even you could understand...
Every flower that God ever created grows here!
They sneak in through the weak spots in peoples' hearts.
I hate you, Mom!
Get a hold of yourself, damnit!
Mameshiba
Ba by!
Shi ba!
Ba by!
Mameshiba
LOVE
The Blue Exorcist

nou no black box wo shiru sore wa kou ka
you wa limit line wo subete ryouga
saa ikou ka fumidasu sore wa kyou da
yappa hibi wa ika sen kou sotsunaku konashitecha no no

atsuku naru mune wo osaetsukeru no wa

mune wo moyasu hi wa dare ni mo keseya shinai

After birth, people live as they wish
They then learn the black box in their head; is that bliss?
Just cross over, beyond the line of your limit
Let us go, take a step, and I mean this minute
Life's a bitch, so if it is easy, you are doing it wrong
Stop, which way is the world going?
Then ignore it and go wherever (here we go)
There are things I could never have, things with time
Is there a reason I force my heart upon them?
I never tried to understand, I just forced it on them
I am no better than those lifeless adults
Even if it is just a pipe dream I could never have
But no one can put out the fire in my heart
The black rain may pour hard and leave me drenched
But I know I can change, I will change myself
This is my pride, what makes up my core
I will not let my fire be put out; not yet
I will keep going, and I will never stop
Kimi to deatta no wa
Tada no guuzen ja nai
Kore wo unmei to yobunda
Sono hitomi ni utsuru
Bokutachi ga kagayaite
Irareru youni zutto

It was not by chance
that I met you.
This is what they call fate.
Reflected in your eyes is
the way we keep on shining together.
Let us keep our gazes locked
so it will not fade away.
(Please be) Maybe the day will come
(With me) that we will lose our way
while looking for the door to the future.
Ready, ready, ready for the take off
We will soar high
towards an unknown world.
So do not let go of my hand.
(Buddy)
Ready, ready, ready for the take off.
Hold on to the bonds we have
while aiming for
the place of our dreams.
Ready, ready, ready for the take off.
Hold on to the bonds we have
while aiming for
